item.title: Loading new data on samples we already have in Xena
item.description:
Loading new data on samples we already have in Xena.

TCGA database is TCGA Prostate Cancer (PRAD);

Local data is from Cell Rep. PMID# 29617662

item.title: Local UCSC Xena Data Hub
item.description: Application example: Analysis of the total population of monocytes from patients with metastatic breast cancer (MBC), sepsis, or tuberculosis.
